title: Scoom
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Fast food, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bakery chain that also sells snack food for take away. Most products are not vegan, but you'll find a few vegan suitable items like sandwich with hummus and falafel, a wrap, salad with soba noodles and tofu, chickpea salad, couscous salad. Has soy milk for coffee. This one is at Terminal 1, Level 0, when you take the escalator from Departure A/B down to the railway station for regional trains.
